decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PL-01 Rev A; PL-02 Rev A; Unnumbered Design and Access Statement; and Planning Statement Ref: EL/PD11577 dated 2 August 2018. Received: 06/08/2018.
PL-201 Rev A. Received: 11/09/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - No works to the development hereby permitted shall commence on site until a Method Statement Plan, to include details of cladding and replacement window installation methods, details of any cranes to be used and location of these, and measures to prevent dust and debris being blown or otherwise deposited onto the M4 Motorway, has been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The installation permitted by consent shall be carried out in accordance with the approved Method Statement Plan unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - No structure/ fixture shall encroach/ over-sail the TLRN public highway of A4 Great West Road post completion; All construction/ maintenance vehicles for the proposal must load/ unload/ park away from the public highway of A4 Great West Road at all times; and No cherry picker/ ladder shall be erected from the footway/ carriageway of A4 Great West Road associated with the proposal.
description: External alterations to building including introduction of new feature windows, re-cladding of plant screen with curtain walling with composite infill panels, re-spraying of existing metal cladding panels, new cladding panels, curtain walling, obscure glass panels, terrace doors, opening panel in existing panelling and curtain walling, and new obscure glazed balustrade (amended description).
